'WLQ_STRTARIVWRK_COF1',
'WLQ_SITSTNDSTY_COF1',
'WLQ_REPMOTION_COF1',
'WLQ_PYSEMO_CONTRT_COF1',
'WLQ_PYSEMO_SPEAK_COF1',
'WLQ_PYSEMO_HDLWRK_COF1',
'WLQ_PYSEMO_FHSWRK_COF1']
}

var str = []
for(var key in sections) {
  var rcount = 0
  var qcount = 0
  var arr = sections[key]
  for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    var j = $(stage + arr[i])
    if(j.isNull().value()) {
      continue
    }  
    qcount++
    rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0
  }
  if(0 == qcount) {
    str.push(null)
  } else {
    str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount)
  }
}
newSequence(str, 'decimal')
